article_title: Take the Mobile vs. Desktop Headline Quiz

article_metadata.description: I get a mobile wake-up call every week. This time I discovered the Top 10 Forbes.com headlines on smartphones generated 50% more page views during a recent week than the Top 10 headlines on desktop. That made me dig deeper. I found that seven of the 20 headlines were platform [...]
article_metadata.author: Lewis DVorkin
